idea-plugin.name: Usage Preview
idea-plugin.description:
Show usages with a syntax-highlighted editor preview panel. Replaces the default usage popup with a dual-pane view: usage list on the left, live editor preview on the right.
IdeaVim bindings: - nmap gd :action UsagePreview.ShowUsagesWithPreview<CR> (go to definition, or show usages if on definition) - nmap gu :action UsagePreview.ShowUsagesAlways<CR> (always show usages popup)

action.description: Go to definition, or show usages popup if already on the definition
Show usages popup for the symbol at caret regardless of context
